nodes.bodyText: Why removing the static final declaration and use the string literal directly?
Both defines are used in one place only. These defines seem superfluous when one-use only.  What you thinking?

The DEFAULT_CANARY_INFOPORT is not used anywhere anymore after this change.
Let me put back HBASE_CANARY_INFO_BINDADDRESS so you'll +1 on this and I can get it in. Thanks.
I think it's fine to remove these constants, at least to make them private. Anyway, I see no reason for them to be public.
